description: Below are some of the more famous and classic happy looking Japanese emoticons. These are emotes that are easily recognizable by most people and now you can use them for yourself! They are often used on websites like Reddit and 4chan. Try personalizing these famous happy emotes with different arms, objects, or words! title: Famous Happy Emoticons
